Online case convertor

Convet any text between Uppercase, Lowercase, Title Case, snake case, camel case, SEO friendly text

Loading...
UPPERCASE

Capital letters only. Convert text into all capital letters. This style can be used in headings and special situations, such as for typographical emphasis in text made on a typewriter.

Ex: GRUMPY WIZARDS MAKE TOXIC BREW FOR THE EVIL QUEEN AND JACK

lowercase

No capital letters. Convert text into lowercase letters. This style is sometimes used for artistic effect, such as in poetry.

Ex: grumpy wizards make toxic brew for the evil queen and jack

Title Case

All workd starts with capital letter. Convert text into first letter capital letter and remaining letters in lower case

Ex: Grumpy Wizards Make Toxic Brew For The Evil Queen And Jack

snake_case

Convert text into lower case with underscores

Ex: grumpy_wizards_make_toxic_brew_for_the_evil_queen_and_jack

SCREAMING_SNAKE_CASE

Convert text into capital letter with underscores

Ex: GRUMPY_WIZARDS_MAKE_TOXIC_BREW_FOR_THE_EVIL_QUEEN_AND_JACK

Camel case

Camel case (also camelCase, CamelCase, camel caps or medial capitals)

UpperCamelcase

Convert text into UpperCamelCase. All firstletter of the words are in capital letter without space.

Ex: GrumpyWizardsMakeToxicBrewForTheEvilQueenAndJack

lowerCamelCase

Convert text into lowerCamelCase. First character are in small letter and All other firstletter of the words are in capital letter without space.

Ex: grumpyWizardsMakeToxicBrewForTheEvilQueenAndJack

single space

Convert text into actual text without extra spaces.

Input: This is test TEXT

Input: This is test TEXT

SEO friendly url

Remove all spaces and special characters and replace all spaces with single dash(-).

Ex: grumpy-wizards-make-toxic-brew-for-the-evil-queen-and-jack
